charges.charge_description: BANK FRAUD 18:1344 and 1349 Conspiracy to Commit Bank Fraud(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to the custody of the US BOP to be imprisoned for a term of 24 months. Supervised release - 5 years. $100.00 special assessment. Restitution in the amount of $1,994,788.01, joint and several with co-defendants Rumeal Robinson and Stephenie Hodge (See judgment for details)

charges.charge_description: BANK FRAUD 18:1344 and 1349 Conspiracy to Commit Bank Fraud(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to the custody of the US BOP to be imprisoned for a term of 78 months on counts one, two and five through thirteen, to be served concurrently. Supervised release - 5 years on counts one, two and five through thirteen, to be served concurrently. Special assessment - $1,100.00. ($100 per count); Restitution in amount of $1,184,616.00, joint and several with co-defendants, Stephenie Hodge and Brian J. Williams.
